variations.description: Deals Physical DMG equal to 300% of ATK to a single target.

Deals Physical DMG equal to 400% of ATK to a single target.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 450% of ATK to a single target.
Deals Physical DMG equal to 500% of ATK to a single target.

Strengthens Normal Attacks to deal damage equal to 215% of ATK and increases Evilsend's damage by 32%.

Strengthens Normal Attacks to deal damage equal to 235% of ATK and increases Evilsend's damage by 40%.
Increases damage dealt by 2.5% for 10s after casting Evilsend. Can stack up to 12.5%.
Increases damage dealt by 5% for 10s after casting Evilsend. Can stack up to 25%.
